runes.Description: The rune of the wind and the magicks it carries.
runes.Functionality: Enemies will occasionally be afflicted by a "bullet attraction" field when hit by a weapon affected by Alca's Breath. Projectiles will be redirected to affected targets within the field's range, dealing full damage.
runes.Name: Alca's Breath

runes.Description: The rune of the erst storm, the root of all rain.
runes.Functionality: Damaging an enemy using a weapon with Archstorm active will trigger a delayed lightning strike on the target, dealing bonus Voltaic damage. The bonus Voltaic damage does not modify the weapon's base damage.
runes.Name: Archstorm

runes.Description: The rune of the ember, ready to be stoked.
runes.Functionality: Imbues the weapon and transforms its damage type to Flame damage. Attacks gain the listed Flame Damage Bonus and cause an explosion on hit.
runes.Name: Emberaught

runes.Description: The rune of the eternal flame, never to be stifled.
runes.Functionality: Imbues the weapon and transforms its damage type to Flame damage. Attacks gain the listed Flame Damage Bonus and cause an explosion on hit.
runes.Name: Everflame (Greatsword)

runes.Description: The rune of the eternal flame, never to be stifled.
runes.Functionality: Imbues the weapon and transforms its damage type to Flame damage. Attacks gain the listed Flame Damage Bonus and cause an explosion on hit.
runes.Name: Everflame (Long Blade)

runes.Description: The rune of the Fey Torch, alight 'yond the veil.
runes.Functionality: Imbues the weapon and transforms its damage type to Flame damage. Attacks gain the listed Flame Damage Bonus and cause an explosion on hit.
runes.Name: Forburn

runes.Description: The rune of the gusts ever-whirling.
runes.Functionality: Damaging an enemy using a weapon with Hurlwind active will trigger a delayed lightning strike on the target, dealing bonus Voltaic damage. The bonus Voltaic damage does not modify the weapon's base damage.
runes.Name: Hurlwind

runes.Functionality: Grants bonus damage when parrying attacks.
runes.Name: The Durglint

runes.Functionality: Grants invisibility on activation. Stealth kills while active extend the duration.
runes.Name: The Flitsmoke

runes.Description: The rune of held breath bursting free.
runes.Functionality: Marks enemies on hit; when marked enemies die, they trigger a radial explosion dealing damage to nearby enemies. The mark and blast persist after deactivation. Does not explode if the initial hit kills the target.
runes.Name: The Hollowing

runes.Description: The rune of the phantoms formed in mist
runes.Functionality: Turns melee attacks into ranged projectiles on activation.
runes.Name: The Mistgale

runes.Description: The rune of the mighty hail.
runes.Functionality: Summons an Arrow Hail on activation.
runes.Name: The Torrent

runes.Description: The rune of the Fey Torch, alight 'yond the veil.
runes.Functionality: Imbues the weapon and transforms its damage type to Flame damage. Attacks gain the listed Flame Damage Bonus and cause an explosion on hit.
runes.Name: Torcheternal
